Name: Gravlist
About the game: Gravlist is gravitational 2d platformer . Our player tries to overcome all the obstacles in front of him to find his goal A narrative-driven, single-player colorful gravitational adventure 40+ levels Boss 3 colorful areas Puzzle-like areas Invisibility mode Lightning-fast revivals keep finding you as you search for your goal and brave its many dangers.
